channel.title: Geospatial on Civic Open Data
channel.description: Recent content in Geospatial on Civic Open Data

item.title: What should be included with a map
item.description: Maps are a great way to visualize data that has a spatial component, and I love creating maps. There are a few things though that you should keep in mind when creating maps. These tips will help your readers to understand your map better and help you remember when and why you created the map. Most of the time there are two kinds of maps: static maps and interactive maps.
